message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this unique product for $20000. It's a fantastic opportunity and I believe it will be worth a lot to you. Let me know your thoughts!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Can we meet in the middle somewhere?

Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $12000 is simply too low.  I'm willing to come down a bit from my original offer.  How about we meet in the middle at $16000?  This is still a great deal for you and allows me to make a fair profit.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $16000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $14000? I think that's a fair price for this product.

Bob,  I understand your budget constraints, but $14000 is still a bit low.  I'm happy to meet you halfway between our last offers.  How about $15000? This price is fair for both of us and will allow us to close this deal.
